content.question: After reading the scenario, respond to A, B, and C below. Referencing the scenario, describe the foundation of the authority of OSHA to carry out policy regarding working conditions and explain how the federal courts can influence OSHA’s authority. Referencing the scenario, explain how the ideology of the president may influence the powers of OSHA. Describe an action Congress could take to provide oversight for OSHA in this scenario and explain how divided government might impact Congress’s ability to oversee OSHA.
